name: CAPTCHAred
description:
You are buying VIP tickets for the best festival in the world - Yesterdayland. You manage to snatch the tickets last-minute, but you are confronted with the one thing everyone fears the most...CAPTCHA.

In this game you are challenged by the infamous CAPTCHA, which has become so intelligent that it is now behaving...almost like a human. And you, yes you, are the first one to ever witness this unknown and unexpected intelligence.

This game was created as a submission for Bratislava Game Jam 2021 by team Angelika. The theme of this jam was "First Contact with Unknown Intelligence."

All you need is a mouse and a keyboard. And trust us, it is best played with the sound ON.
